title: How can I update my account information in GCrypto?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I close my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308971000217-How-can-I-close-my-GCrypto-account)
- [How can I update my account information in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308652046361-How-can-I-update-my-account-information-in-GCrypto)
- [How can I update the details in my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10333738279321-How-can-I-update-the-details-in-my-GCrypto-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

You might see a prompt to update your account information even if you’re Fully Verified because it’s been a while since you first verified it. The Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas requires Fully Verified users to update their information regularly to keep full access to all GCash features.

To update your GCrypto account information, you first need to ensure [your GCash profile is up to date.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360034342914-Update-Account-Information-in-GCash) You can change details such as your **name, email address, birthday, birthplace, nationality, address, and income source** directly in your GCash profile.

### **How to update GCash Profile:**

1. Open your GCash app.
2. Go to **Profile** and tap on your name
3. Tap Update **Account Information > Update Your Profile**
4. Enter the 6-digit authentication code sent to your GCash-registered number and tap **Next**
5. Complete the verification process and fill out the necessary fields

Your profile will be updated within **3 days**, and an SMS confirmation will be sent to your registered mobile number.

Once your GCash profile is updated, [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gcrypto%3A%3Ai_want_to_update_my_gcrypto_account_information&ticket_form_id=360000706713) to change your GCrypto account information.

If you are requesting to change your **mobile number**, please ensure that your new mobile number is [Fully Verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC), then [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gcrypto%3A%3Ai_want_to_change_my_mobile_number_in_gcrypto&ticket_form_id=360000706713) A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours.**

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I update the details in my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10333738279321-Update-Mobile-Number-in-GCrypto)
- [How can I buy crypto in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9781977718425-Buy-crypto-with-GCrypto)
- [How can I sell crypto in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31306888871833-Sell-crypto-with-GCrypto)
- [How can I top up my GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10200245771545-Top-up-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
